metadata.title: CVE-2022-27405 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
FreeType commit 53dfdcd8198d2b3201a23c4bad9190519ba918db was discovered tocontain a segmentation violation via the function FNT_Size_Request.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-27405` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

freetype2-demos - 2.8.1-2ubuntu2.2
libfreetype6 - 2.8.1-2ubuntu2.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freetype package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.8.1-2ubuntu2.2').
